item.title: 监视：对美联储而言，"六月 "现在看起来更像是 "稍后"。
item.description:
富国银行的布赖森表示，5月份 "不在讨论之列"，7月份更有可能

。【原文：

May is ‘off the table,’ and July is more likely, Wells Fargo’s Bryson says

】

item.title: 摩根士丹利赢得 140 万欧元法国奖金与辞职银行家之争
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在一场法庭斗争中获胜，推翻了一名银行家获得的 140 万欧元（150 万美元）递延奖金。【原文：Morgan Stanley won a court fight to overturn €1.4 million ($1.5 million) in deferred bonuses given to a banker who sued for the award after he quit the investment bank for one of his biggest clients.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯在首席执行官扭亏为盈之际重获投资级评级
item.description: 劳斯莱斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）重新获得标准普尔（Standard & Poor's）的投资级信用评级，这是该公司近四年来首次获得这一评级，因为投资者对这家在首席执行官图凡-埃尔金比勒吉奇（Tufan Erginbilgic）领导下实现扭亏为盈的英国飞机发动机制造商持更有利的看法。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc regained an investment-grade credit rating with Standard & Poor’s for the first time in almost four years, as investors take a more favorable view of the UK aircraft engine manufacturer undergoing a turnaround under Chief Executive Officer Tufan Erginbilgic.】

item.title: 梅西百货愿意与 Arkhouse 和 Brigade 就收购要约进行接触
item.description: 梅西百货公司准备让 Arkhouse Management Co. 和 Brigade Capital Management 查看其财务状况，以争取这两家投资公司提高对这家标志性连锁百货公司的最新收购报价。【原文：Macy’s Inc. is ready to let Arkhouse Management Co. and Brigade Capital Management look at its finances in an effort to get the investment firms to increase their latest takeover offer for the iconic department store chain.】

item.title: 通胀数据令人失望，国债收益率创一周新高
item.description: 在一份报告显示 2 月份批发价格涨幅超过预期，略微削弱了人们对美联储今年降息前景的信心之后，美国政府债券收益率达到了一周多以来的最高水平。【原文：US government bond yields reached the highest levels in more than a week after a report showed wholesale prices rose more than forecast in February, slightly eroding confidence in the outlook for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 千禧年交易员在埃及外汇暴跌中获得 4000 万美元暴利
item.description: 全球最大的对冲基金之一千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）的一位高级交易员成功下注后，埃及允许其货币贬值，该公司因此获利数千万美元。【原文：Millennium Management, one of the world’s biggest hedge funds, made tens of millions of dollars when Egypt allowed its currency to weaken after a successful bet by one of its senior traders, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称加密货币 "怪兽 "周期来临，买入 Robinhood
item.description: 一家看好加密货币卷土重来的华尔街公司称，到 2025 年，数字资产的市值将增长近三倍，达到 7.5 万亿美元。【原文：The market value of digital assets is poised to nearly triple to $7.5 trillion by 2025, according to one Wall Street firm that is bullish on a cryptocurrency comeback.】

item.title: 英国利用国家支持的贷款加大塞兹韦尔核电站的推进力度
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在与投资基金商谈贷款事宜，以帮助为英国塞兹韦尔 C 核电厂的建设提供资金。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is in talks with investment funds about loans to help to finance the construction of the UK’s Sizewell C nuclear plant, as the government steps up efforts to get a key energy project off the drawing board this year.】

item.title: 德雅丹警告称，加拿大弗里兰有望无法实现赤字目标
item.description: 据加拿大最大的金融合作社称，除非加拿大大幅削减开支或找到新的收入来源，否则不可能实现其赤字目标。【原文：Canada is unlikely to meet its deficit goals unless it makes substantial spending cuts or finds new sources of revenue, according to the country’s largest financial co-operative.】

item.title: 中国商品涌入墨西哥，使其成为全球贸易的首要通道
item.description: 今年，全球商品贸易在世界经济的大多数角落都难以加速发展，但有一个很大的例外：中国商品流入墨西哥。【原文：Global goods trade is struggling to accelerate in most corners of the world economy this year — with one big exception: Chinese goods flowing into Mexico.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份 PPI 升幅超过预期后黄金下跌
item.description: 数据显示美国 2 月份生产者价格涨幅超过预期，抑制了美联储即将降息的预期，黄金因此下滑。【原文：Gold slipped after data showed US producer prices rose in February by more than forecast, damping expectations that the Federal Reserve will soon cut interest rates.】

item.title: 约翰-刘易斯放弃莎伦-怀特的目标，从住房和金融业获利
item.description: John Lewis Partnership Plc 即将离任的董事长已经取消了将该零售商 40% 的利润用于住房、金融服务和其他非核心业务的计划。【原文：The outgoing chairman of the John Lewis Partnership Plc has scrapped her plan for 40% of the retailer’s profits to come from housing, financial services and other non-core parts of the business.】

item.title: 雪佛龙哈萨克石油项目面临 15 亿美元额外成本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）为提高哈萨克斯坦巨大的腾吉兹油田（Tengiz field）的石油产量而牵头进行的一项重大开发项目的成本增加了约 15 亿美元，这是一连串成本超支和延期中的最新一次。【原文：The cost of a major development led by Chevron Corp. to boost oil output at Kazakhstan’s giant Tengiz field has risen by about $1.5 billion, the latest in a string of cost overruns and delays, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 称房价已触底，是时候购买房地产了
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 总裁乔恩-格雷（Jon Gray）表示，房地产价格已经触底，现在是快速出手、以低价购买资产的大好时机。总裁 Jon Gray 表示。【原文：Real estate prices have bottomed and there’s a great opportunity to move fast and buy assets at beaten-down prices, according to Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray.】

item.title: 亚当-诺伊曼的 Flow 计划在迈阿密市中心建造公寓和办公室
item.description: 亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）的房地产初创公司福禄（Flow）计划在迈阿密开发价值 3 亿美元的项目，该地区十年前还被称为 "帐篷城"。【原文：Adam Neumann’s real estate startup Flow is planning $300 million in Miami developments in an area that was known as tent city just a decade ago.】

item.title: 石油的新兴强势并不能保证反弹
item.description:
价格似乎找到了每桶 80 美元以上的底线，但要突破 90 美元很难。【原文：

Prices appear to have found a floor above $80 a barrel, but breaking through $90 will be hard.

】

item.title: 据称塔塔考虑收购迪士尼在印度电视平台的股份
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，塔塔集团正在考虑收购华特迪士尼公司在塔塔播放有限公司（Tata Play Ltd. ）的股份，从而完全控制这家订阅电视广播公司，印度媒体业的震荡仍在继续。【原文：Tata Group is considering buying Walt Disney Co.’s stake in Tata Play Ltd. to give it full control of the subscription television broadcaster, people familiar with the matter said, continuing a shakeup in India’s media industry.】

item.title: 乌克兰意外减产，通胀加剧，资金流入
item.description: 乌克兰央行出人意料地降低了借贷成本，理由是通胀放缓以及对外国向基辅提供财政援助的预期有所改善，因为基辅正在继续击退俄罗斯的入侵。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank unexpectedly lowered borrowing costs, citing slowing inflation and improved expectations of foreign financial assistance for Kyiv as it continues to repel Russia’s invasion.】

item.title: 肯尼亚先令在一个季度内从落后者变为领先者
item.description: 肯尼亚先令在不到三个月的时间里卷土重来，从世界上最差的货币之一跃升为世界上最好的货币。【原文：Kenya’s shilling has staged a comeback that’s vaulted it from one of the worst to the best in the world in less than three months.】

item.title: 律师称海斯陪审团在利差问题上受到不公正影响
item.description: 前瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）和花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Lawyers for ex-UBS Group AG and Citigroup Inc. trader Tom Hayes asked London judges to overturn his almost decade-old criminal conviction because his jury was unfairly influenced by the trial judge.】

item.title: 消息称土耳其讨论回购短期美元债券
item.description: 据四位熟知内情的人士透露，土耳其财政部已经与银行家讨论了回购短期美元债券的可能性，以便用期限较长的债务将其置换出来。【原文：Turkey’s Treasury has discussed with bankers a potential buyback of short-term dollar bonds to switch them out with debt at longer maturities, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元通用公司业绩展望显示扭亏为盈，股价上涨
item.description: Dollar General 公司发布的同店销售前景超出华尔街预期，表明该公司扭亏为盈的努力开始显现成效。【原文：Dollar General Inc. gave a same-store sales outlook that beat Wall Street expectations, indicating that efforts to turnaround the business are starting to show results.】

item.title: 生物技术反弹获 1,000 亿美元融资，未来将有更多交易
item.description: 在过去的五个月里，一系列交易帮助扭转了生物技术股的颓势。正如阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）斥资10亿美元收购控股公司Amolyt Pharma的交易所表明的那样，未来可能还会有更多的交易。【原文：A rash of dealmaking helped reverse the declining fortunes of biotech stocks over the last five months. And as AstraZeneca Plc’s $1 billion deal to acquire closely-held Amolyt Pharma illustrates, the likelihood is there’s much more to come.】

item.title: 土耳其黄金进口因政府限制再次下滑
item.description: 土耳其的黄金进口量连续第四个月下降，原因是即使在国内需求激增的情况下，政府为支撑外部财政而实施的限制措施也挤压了供应。【原文：Turkey’s gold imports declined for the fourth straight month as government restrictions meant to shore up external finances squeeze supply, even in the face of soaring domestic demand.】

item.title: 私人投资者出资 150 亿美元重建乌克兰
item.description: 在国家机构和资本市场的支持下，一项帮助乌克兰重建的私人投资者计划旨在提供 150 亿美元的资金。【原文：A program for private investors to help rebuild Ukraine is aiming to provide $15 billion of funding with support from state bodies and capital markets.】

item.title: 橡树树校友从紧张的信贷转向更高质量的信贷
item.description: 在过去的一年里，一对橡树资本集团（Oaktree Capital Group）的校友创办了 Shorecliff 资产管理公司（Shorecliff Asset Management），他们将投资方向从受压转向了更高质量的履约信贷，使他们所监管的资产总额增加了两倍多。【原文：In just the past year, a pair of Oaktree Capital Group alums — who pivoted to invest in higher-quality performing credit from stressed when they launched Shorecliff Asset Management — have more than tripled the sum of assets they oversee.】

item.title: Actis 据称将在新基建基金首次关闭时筹集 8 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，正在被 General Atlantic 收购的私募股权公司 Actis 已在一个新的新兴市场基础设施基金的首次交易中筹集了 8 亿美元。【原文：Actis, the private equity firm being acquired by General Atlantic, has raised $800 million at the first close of a new emerging markets-focused infrastructure fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称欧洲央行官员将在 6 月决策前了解更多信息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，到 6 月份召开会议时，政策制定者将对通货紧缩的进展情况有更清晰的认识。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said policymakers will have a clearer view of progress on disinflation by the time they meet in June.】

item.title: 沙特股票交易量意外飙升令交易所受益
item.description: 今年以来，沙特股票的交易量出人意料地激增，极大地推动了证券交易所运营商沙特塔达武尔集团控股公司（Saudi Tadawul Group Holding Co.【原文：Trading volumes of Saudi equities have unexpectedly surged this year in a big boost to the stock exchange operator Saudi Tadawul Group Holding Co.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在下周的美联储会议之前，人们都在关注今天的美国生产者价格指数报告。此外，石油市场可能终究会出现供应短缺，大宗商品交易商正在押注波动性。索菲亚-奥尔塔-科斯塔（Sofia Horta e Costa）想收到本新闻通讯的西班牙语版本吗？注册获取 Five Things：西班牙语版时事通讯。【原文：Good morning. Eyes are on today’s US PPI report ahead of next week’s Fed meeting. Plus, the oil market may be headed for a supply deficit after all, and commodities traders are betting against volatility. Here’s what people are talking about. — Sofia Horta e CostaWant to receive this newsletter in Spanish? Sign up to get the Five Things: Spanish Edition newsletter.】
